tool_description: Global COVID-19 data (free to use). - latest data: Aug. 16, 2020
name: WHO Covid-19 data
title: WHO Covid-19 data

api_list.name: Regions
api_list.description: Get a list of valid region.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://who-covid-19-data.p.rapidapi.com/api/data/regions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "who-covid-19-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://who-covid-19-data.p.rapidapi.com/api/data/regions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "who-covid-19-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get data
api_list.description:
Get the data.
(If no query parameters are provided, returns data for the most recent report)

optional_parameters.name: deaths
optional_parameters.description: Limit search to n number of total confirmed deaths and above.

optional_parameters.name: newCases
optional_parameters.description: Limit search to n number of new confirmed cases (since the previous report) and above.

optional_parameters.name: newDeaths
optional_parameters.description: Limit search to n number of new confirmed deaths (since the previous report) and above.

optional_parameters.name: transmissionType
optional_parameters.description: Filter data by a specific method of virus transmission.

optional_parameters.name: cases
optional_parameters.description: Limit search to n number of total confirmed cases and above.

optional_parameters.name: reportNumber
optional_parameters.description: Each report has a report number attached.

optional_parameters.name: territory
optional_parameters.description: Get only countries or only territories.

optional_parameters.name: reportDate
optional_parameters.description: Get data for a specific day.

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: Enter a valid country or territory.

api_list.name: Names
api_list.description: Get a list of valid country and territory names.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://who-covid-19-data.p.rapidapi.com/api/data/names"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "who-covid-19-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
